snippet.title: Why is April Fools' Day in April
snippet.description: Because it says "April" fools. Oh and if you want to know a good joke you need this stuff: CLEAR

snippet.title: What day is April Fools' Day
snippet.description: There is no particular day for it. It just falls on whichever day is April 1st for that year.

snippet.title: What day is April fool day
How do you fool your friends on April Fools' Day
snippet.description: Load a BSOD screensaver on their computer and then tape over the bottom of their computer mouse. Set the screensaver to activate within 1 minute.

snippet.title: Is April 1st April Fools' Day
snippet.description: Yes, April 1 st is celebrated by playing practical jokes.

snippet.title: Pranks for April Fools' Day
snippet.description: if you have dogs take some lemonade and warm it up and poor it wherever ;) get it?
